name: Rogue Desperado
description:
Rogue Desperado.  A spiritual successor to the NES/Arcade game Gun.Smoke.  Player takes on the role of the Rogue Desperado, a bounty hunter looking to end the Wingate Gang.

Youtube video is from an earlier build, but gives you an idea of the gameplay.

Current Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire

R - Reload

Esc - Pause

Left/Right Arrow Keys to snap rotate camera.

Double Backspace to Regen the level if required.
